title: (x) 'A hug would make my day' 70's font - Souvenir {Rainer}
content:
any help would be greatly appreciated! i am in love with this font!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316054844im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hug-1_4976.jpg)
author: ktc1733

comments.content:
The tiny one? Don’t you think that’s a bit small to identify it, Katie?

Start at [Souvenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316054844/http:/www.identifont.com/show?OL) until you get a better sample …

Looking at the tiny 'y', I think your first guess was better Renko.

- Mike Yanega
sorry, guys, i know it's ridiculously small, but it's the only place i've seen this particular font that i know of. thanks so much for your help!
Smells very much like Souvenir to me too.
